response.overview: Three foreign students—two young men and a young woman—find themselves lost in translation in a bustling new country. Craving a familiar meal, they set off on what becomes a comically frustrating journey from one restaurant to another. Though the dish they long for is available everywhere, language barriers prevent them from communicating their order. A light-hearted yet poignant tale about miscommunication, cultural disconnection, and the universal comfort of food.

production_companies.name: Film and Television Institute of India (FTII)

response.title: Alla Romano? Alla Indiano?
